definitions: the quality of being pleasing or appealing to the senses

examples.text: this scheme could enhance the attractiveness of the area

shortDefinitions: quality of being pleasing or appealing to senses

definitions: (in a person) the quality of being appealing or sexually alluring to look at

examples.text: my aunt did not marry until late in life in spite of her attractiveness
simply smiling can increase your attractiveness to others

shortDefinitions: quality of being appealing to look at

definitions: the possession of qualities or features that arouse interest

examples.text: the new agreements will enhance the city 's attractiveness to overseas investors

shortDefinitions: possession of qualities or features that arouse interest
